fields.name: AssociatedResourceIds
fields.description: The list of resource IDs for the other Microsoft.NetworkCloud resources that have attached this network.

fields.name: BmcConnectionString
fields.description: The connection string for the baseboard management controller including IP address and protocol.

fields.name: BmcCredentials
fields.description: The credentials of the baseboard management controller on this bare metal machine.

fields.name: BmcMacAddress
fields.description: The MAC address of the BMC device.

fields.name: BootMacAddress
fields.description: The MAC address of a NIC connected to the PXE network.

fields.name: ClusterId
fields.description: The resource ID of the cluster this bare metal machine is associated with.

fields.name: CordonStatus
fields.description: The cordon status of the bare metal machine.

fields.name: DetailedStatus
fields.description: The more detailed status of the bare metal machine.

fields.name: DetailedStatusMessage
fields.description: The descriptive message about the current detailed status.

fields.name: HardwareInventory
fields.description: The hardware inventory, including information acquired from the model/sku information and from the ironic inspector.

fields.name: HardwareValidationStatus
fields.description: The details of the latest hardware validation performed for this bare metal machine.

fields.name: HybridAksClustersAssociatedIds
fields.description: Field Deprecated. These fields will be empty/omitted. The list of the resource IDs for the HybridAksClusters that have nodes hosted on this bare metal machine.

fields.name: KubernetesNodeName
fields.description: The name of this machine represented by the host object in the Cluster's Kubernetes control plane.

fields.name: KubernetesVersion
fields.description: The version of Kubernetes running on this machine.

fields.name: MachineDetails
fields.description: The custom details provided by the customer.

fields.name: MachineName
fields.description: The OS-level hostname assigned to this machine.

fields.name: MachineSkuId
fields.description: The unique internal identifier of the bare metal machine SKU.

fields.name: OamIPv4Address
fields.description: The IPv4 address that is assigned to the bare metal machine during the cluster deployment.

fields.name: OamIPv6Address
fields.description: The IPv6 address that is assigned to the bare metal machine during the cluster deployment.

fields.name: OsImage
fields.description: The image that is currently provisioned to the OS disk.

fields.name: PowerState
fields.description: The power state derived from the baseboard management controller.

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: The provisioning state of the bare metal machine.

fields.name: RackId
fields.description: The resource ID of the rack where this bare metal machine resides.

fields.name: RackSlot
fields.description: The rack slot in which this bare metal machine is located, ordered from the bottom up i.e. the lowest slot is 1.

fields.name: ReadyState
fields.description: The indicator of whether the bare metal machine is ready to receive workloads.

fields.name: SerialNumber
fields.description: The serial number of the bare metal machine.

fields.name: ServiceTag
fields.description: The discovered value of the machine's service tag.

fields.name: VirtualMachinesAssociatedIds
fields.description: Field Deprecated. These fields will be empty/omitted. The list of the resource IDs for the VirtualMachines that are hosted on this bare metal machine.
